summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Moove fitness app authentication flow. All major authentication features working correctly including onboarding, login, registration, success pages, auth callback, and logout functionality with proper styling and dev mode auto-login.

ui_bugs.issue: Try again link doesn't redirect to login page properly
Logout doesn't redirect to onboarding page (stays on profile page)

passed_tests: Onboarding page displays welcome slides with GET STARTED and LOG IN buttons
Onboarding page has proper background blur and white text styling
Onboarding page slide navigation works with dots
Login page has email input and SEND ME A LOGIN LINK button
Login page has proper styling with background blur and white text
Login page has back button and footer links
Login flow works - entering email and clicking login redirects to home page
Dev mode auto-login works (API returns token directly)
Token stored correctly in localStorage as 'moovefit-token'
User data stored correctly in localStorage
Registration page has email input, terms checkbox, and create account button
Registration page has proper styling with background blur and white text
Registration page has Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy links
Registration flow works - creates account and redirects to home page
Success page shows 'Login link sent' message with proper styling
Success page has OPEN EMAIL APP button and Try again link
Auth callback page handles cases with and without token correctly
Auth callback page redirects appropriately based on token presence
Logout functionality clears token and user data from localStorage
All auth pages have consistent styling with background blur and white text
Magic link authentication flow implemented correctly with dev mode
API integration working with mocked endpoints returning tokens
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix minor navigation issues: 1) Success page 'Try again' link should redirect to login page, 2) Profile logout should redirect to onboarding page instead of staying on profile page
